channel.title: Need Help ~~~~Vista~~~~
channel.description: Can someone please show me how to run a server with a Linksys router On windows vista, i have a xp but it is in my basement and all i did was port forwarded and it works fine, i portfowarded on my laptop windows vista [brandnew] and nothing happens So any idea(s)?

item.title: Need Help ~~~~Vista~~~~
item.dc:creator: @shotgunpker shotgunpker
item.description:
@shotgunpker wrote:

[quote=“moparwha, post:2, topic:250292”]Is it even possible to portforward on a laptop?

Lol even if so linksys is the most common router used. I’m shocked your asking questions about it[/quote][quote=“wolfs goal, post:3, topic:250292”]dude vista sucks for 1 thing, so no one can help you there much, and you dont need a router to host a server, mines been unplugged for like 2 weeks now, people can use muh source though[/quote]
to quote number 1:Yes you can portfrorward on a laptop I use my laptop for my server.
to number 2:Give me a reason.Come on backing up.
